casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

September 22, 2010

[Cite as 09/22/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-4443.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2010-0564. Elyria v. Lorain Cty. Budget Comm.

Board of Tax Appeals, Nos. 2003-M-1533, 2004-M-1166, and 2005-M-1301. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Board of Tax Appeals. Upon consideration of appellees/cross-appellants’ request for oral argument before the court,

It is ordered by the court that the request is granted.
